com.google.wave.api
Interface Event

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventImpl
public interface Event

An event captures changes made to a Wavelet, Blip, or Document in the Wave system.

Author:
scovitz@google.com (Seth Covitz), mprasetya@google.com (Marcel Prasetya)

Method Summary
 java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getAddedParticipants()
          Returns a list of participants added to the Wavelet (if applicable).
 Blip getBlip()
          Returns the Blip affected by this event (if applicable).
 java.lang.String getButtonName()
          Returns the name of the button that is associated with this event (if applicable).
 java.lang.String getChangedTitle()
          Returns the title of the wave that changed during the event (if applicable).
 java.lang.Long getChangedVersion()
          Returns the changed version of the wave or blip (if applicable).
 java.lang.String getCreatedBlipId()
          Returns the id of the newly created blip (if applicable).
 java.lang.String getModifiedBy()
          Returns the actor/contributor responsible for triggering this event.
 java.lang.String getRemovedBlipId()
          Returns the id of the removed blip (if applicable).
 java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getRemovedParticipants()
          Returns a list of participants removed from the Wavelet (if applicable).
 java.lang.Long getTimestamp()
          Returns the timestamp measured in milliseconds since the UNIX epoch, when the event was triggered.
 EventType getType()
          Returns the type of event this instance represents.
 Wavelet getWavelet()
          Returns the Wavelet affected by this event.
